import React, { useState } from 'react' import './LoginSignup.css' import user_icon from '../assets/user_icon.png' import email_icon from '../assets/email_icon.png' import lock_icon from '../assets/lock_icon.png' const LoginSignup = () => { const [action, setAction] = useState("Sign Up"); // Initialize state with "Sign Up" const toggleAction = () => { setAction(action === "Sign Up" ? "Login" : "Sign Up"); // Toggle between "Sign Up" and "Login" }; return (
{action}
Lost password?click here!
Sign Up
Login
); } export default LoginSignup
